product_name: Native Eyewear Hardtop XP Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Native Eyewear Hardtop XP Polarized Sunglasses come with 2 pairs of lenses for bright or low light, and they are 20% larger than the regular Hardtop sunglasses for more protection. Includes one set of polarized brown lenses for bright sun and one set of SportFlex(TM) lenses for low light, for a total of 2 sets of lenses. SportFlex orange-yellow lenses have a blue mirror coating suitable for a range of low-light conditions from cloudy, overcast, dusk and dawn. A unique interchangeable lens system lets you switch lenses without smudging the surfaces with fingerprints. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) lenses have the strongest hard coating available to protect against scratching. Rhyno-Tuff(R) AIR frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Cam-action spring hinges allow the temples to quickly lock into position. P.C.C.(R) lenses pass the rigorous ANSI Z80.3 tests for optical clarity and impact resistance while blocking 100% of harmful UVA and UVB light. Self-adjusting Cushinol(TM) nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place. Frame venting eliminates fog and condensation. The Native Eyewear Hardtop XP Polarized Sunglasses best fit a large to extra-large profile. Sunglasses come with a semi-rigid zippered case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Hardtop XP Polarized Sunglasses come with 2 pairs of lenses for bright or low light, and they are 20% larger than the regular Hardtop sunglasses for more protection.
